name: Flower Power (rjhelms)
description:
I don't know what was in those brownies, man, but our van is totally flying - far out! Use your flower power to turn on the squares, suits, and soldiers!

How to play:

Fly the hippie van over endless procedurally-generated terrain like what you were born to do. Don't crash, and avoid the man's guns and money.

Controls:

Flower Power supports keyboard and gamepad input - the more retro the game pad, the better.

KeyboardGamepadMoveArrow keysLeft stick / D-Pad
Flower cannonLCtrlAFlower bombsLShiftBQuit (desktop only)Alt-F4

Made in 32 hours, August 5-6, 2017, for PtboGameJam03.
